original: ????:wake up....
????:Do you remember your name?
zh_trans: ???:你还记得你的名字吗?

original: ????:Don't remember? It's ok, my name is Kiki
zh_trans: ???:忘了吗?没关系,我的名字是KiKi

original: Kiki:I was sent here to be your guide.
zh_trans: Kiki:我被派遣作为你的向导

original: Kiki:It's a high-tech facility and we're right at the entrance
zh_trans: Kiki:这里是一个高科技设施,我们现在在入口

original: Kiki:An unknown accident happened here
zh_trans: Kiki:这里发生了一起未知的事故

original: Kiki:That's why no one came out to meet us
zh_trans: Kiki:所以没人出来接我们

original: Kiki:That's why you're here, your mission is to investigate what's going on here
zh_trans: Kiki:这就是你来这里的原因,你的任务是调查这里发生了什么

original: Kiki:Have you heard? 108 years ago, a search party found the last plant on a polluted planet
zh_trans: kiki:你听说了吗?108年前,一个搜索队在一个被污染的星球上找到了最后一株植物

original: Kiki:And this facility was built to protect and study that plant
zh_trans: Kiki:这个设施是为了保护和研究这种植物而建的

original: Kiki:Although the planet has stabilized now, it is still a very important building
zh_trans: Kiki:虽然星球现在已经稳定了,但这里仍然是一个非常重要的建筑

original: Kiki:Looks like we have to jump up and touch 8 energy balls to open the door
zh_trans: Kiki:看来我们得跳上去,找到8个能量球才能开门

original: Kiki:No, the facility's security system is activated, which means we are considered the enemy
zh_trans: Kiki:不好,基地的安全系统启动了,言简意赅我们被认为是敌人

original: Kiki:There is no way, we have to break the security system
zh_trans: Kiki:没办法了,我们必须破坏安全系统

original: story1 unlock
zh_trans: 故事1解锁

original: Kiki:Some people's information is scattered here, who could it be?
zh_trans: Kiki:有些人的信息散落在这里,会是谁呢?

original: Kiki:Entering here is the inside of the facility...
zh_trans: Kiki:从这里进入就是设施内部

original: Kiki:That one is distributed by the company, if you lose it I will be penalized
zh_trans: Kiki:那是公司发的,如果你丢了我会被罚的

original: Mapper Enidnu
zh_trans: 地图作者:Enidnu

original: Special Thanks:X1a0Fu/健忘症晚期/lopb/Koen
zh_trans: 特别感谢:x1a0Fu 健忘症晚期 lopb Koen

original: Port by 花澪墨音
zh_trans: 移植作者:花澪墨音 翻译:Shooting Stars

original: Kiki:If you take my pistol, you protect me in case of danger
zh_trans: Kiki:如果你拿了我的手枪,请你在危险的情况下保护我

original: Kiki:It seems that we have to look for these energy balls
zh_trans: Kiki:看来我们得去找这些能量球了

original: Kiki:Take these core energy sources with you
zh_trans: Kiki:把这些东西带在身边

original: Kiki:Throw them into the core reactor to activate
zh_trans: Kiki:把它们扔进核心反应堆激活

original: Kiki:The first location is the factory, it looks like we have to activate three cores to close the waste water gate in the middle
zh_trans: Kiki:第一个地点是工厂,看起来我们必须激活三个核心来关闭中间的废水门

original: Kiki:The road here is very difficult to walk, once a group of search teams were wiped out here...
zh_trans: Kiki:这里的路很难走,曾经有一群搜救队在这里被歼灭

original: Kiki:Hey! You still can't remember your name?
zh_trans: Kiki:嘿!你还是不记得自己的名字吗?

original: Kiki:It is too hard to call you without a name, so let's call you K for now
zh_trans: Kiki:不给你起名字实在是太难受了,所以现在就叫你K吧

original: story2 unlock
zh_trans: 故事2解锁

original: Kiki:It's my K
zh_trans: Kiki:是我的K

original: Kiki:A note...?
zh_trans: Kiki:一个笔记...?

original: Kiki:uh,Although I have heard that the road here is particularly complicated, there is no problem with the brain of the person who designed this, right?
zh_trans: Kiki:虽然我听说这里的路特别复杂,但设计这条路的人的脑子没有问题,对吧?

original: Kiki:Ok, we successfully started the first core
zh_trans: Kiki:好的,我们成功地启动了第一个核心

original: Kiki:Finally, in front of the second core reactor
zh_trans: Kiki:终于到第二个反应堆了

original: Kiki:By the way, you've come this long, do you want a coffee? I just happened to be carrying
zh_trans: Kiki:顺便问一下,你来了这么久,要不要来杯咖啡?当然我只是碰巧带着

original: story3 unlock
zh_trans: 故事3解锁

original: Kiki:Look, I found a diary
zh_trans: Kiki:看,我找到一本日记

original: Kiki:one more, my friend
zh_trans: Kiki:还有一个,我的朋友

original: Kiki:I saw an orange pipe on the way, and maybe we can get to the third core reactor from there
zh_trans: Kiki:我在路上看到了一根橙色的管子,也许我们可以从那里到达第三个堆芯反应堆

original: Kiki:Quick!we have to start the last core before the countdown ends
zh_trans: Kiki:快!我们必须在倒计时结束前启动最后一个核心

original: Kiki:It worked! Now just take the elevator up
zh_trans: Kiki:它开始工作了,我们现在只需要坐电梯上去

original: Kiki:Look behind you, this core has a security system, pay attention to dodge
zh_trans: Kiki:看你身后,这个核心有安全系统,注意躲开

original: Kiki:quick! Jump into the pipe in the middle and go to the sewers
zh_trans: Kiki:快!跳进中间的管道

original: Kiki:This place is full of smells I don't like, find a way out
zh_trans: Kiki:这地方到处都是我不喜欢的味道,想办法出去吧

original: Kiki:I hate how the designers of this facility like to make the door switches so hard to open
zh_trans: Kiki:我讨厌这个设施的设计师把门开关弄得这么难开

original: Kiki:K, do you have any relatives or friends?
zh_trans: Kiki:K,你有亲朋好友吗

original: Kiki:Ah, I forgot you can't even remember your own name
zh_trans: Kiki:嘿,我忘了你连你名字都忘记了

original: Kiki:Honestly, I'm a guide about to be eliminated
zh_trans: Kiki:说实话,我是一个将被裁员的向导

original: Kiki:They say I have more emotions than the average tour guide
zh_trans: Kiki:他们说我比一般的导游更有感情

original: Kiki:If you can take...
zh_trans: Kiki:如果..你能..

original: Kiki:Never mind
zh_trans: Kiki:没关系

original: Kiki:Maybe we won't be able to meet again after this mission is over.
zh_trans: Kiki:也许任务结束后我们就不能再见面了

original: Kiki:It??s so dark, did the designer forget to make a lamp?
zh_trans: Kiki:这么黑,设计师是不是忘了做一盏灯

original: story4 unlock
zh_trans: 故事4解锁

original: Kiki:This looks like a warehouse
zh_trans: Kiki:这看起来是个仓库

original: K:familiar handwriting....
zh_trans: K:熟悉的笔迹

original: Kiki:Through this underground passage we can reach the terminal processing facility
zh_trans: Kiki:通过这条地下通道我们可以到达终端处理设施

original: Kiki:There is a record of the entire facility, so we can know what happened here
zh_trans: Kiki:这里有整个设施的记录,所以我们可以知道这里发生了什么

original: Kiki:wait, what happened, the whole room is changing
zh_trans: Kiki:等等,发生了什么,整个房间都开始变化

original: Kiki:Our way is blocked
zh_trans: Kiki:我们的路被堵住了

original: Kiki:Damn, it's that security system again, K destroy it quickly
zh_trans: Kiki:该死,又是那个安全系统,快摧毁它

original: Kiki:Hey K, look what I found, catch it
zh_trans: Kiki:K,看我找到了什么,抓住它

original: Kiki:Hey K, I found another one, praise me
zh_trans: Kiki:嘿,K,我又找到了一个,快夸夸我

original: Kiki:Whose office is this? It's unexpectedly connected to such a mysterious passage.
zh_trans: Kiki:这是谁的办公室?它居然和这一段有联系

original: story5 unlock
zh_trans: 故事5解锁

original: Kiki:The desk is covered with a lot of research materials. It seems that the owner of this office holds a high position.
zh_trans: Kiki:桌子上摆满了许多研究资料,看来这间办公室的老板地位很高

original: story10 unlock
zh_trans: 故事10解锁

original: K:Is this... my handwriting?
zh_trans: K:这是……我的笔迹吗?

original: Kiki:Hey, that's my pistol...
zh_trans: Kiki:嘿,那是我的手枪

original: Kiki:What is that purple portal on the other side of the door? I've never seen anything like it...
zh_trans: Kiki:门那边那个紫色的传送门是什么?我从来没见过这样的东西

original: Kiki:it's emitting a dangerous aura.
zh_trans: Kiki:它散发出一种危险的气息

original: Kiki:Though I hold no expectations, there is still not a single person here.
zh_trans: Kiki:虽然我不抱任何期望,但这里仍然没有一个人

original: Kiki:Who blocked the entrance here? It seems we'll have to find another way out.
zh_trans: Kiki:谁把这里的入口堵住了?看来我们得另找出路了

original: K:Kiki....
zh_trans: K:Kiki....

original: Kiki:uh.Sorry? Did I talk too much?
zh_trans: Kiki:嗯,对不起?我是不是说的太多了

original: Kiki:After all, you are the last investigator I'm collaborating with.
zh_trans: Kiki:毕竟,你是我最后一个合作的调查员

original: Kiki:Just thinking about what kind of consequences I might face after this mission is over... I'm uncertain.
zh_trans: Kiki:我只是在想任务结束后我可能会面临什么样的后果……我不确定

original: Kiki:I'm feeling a bit restless.
zh_trans: Kiki:我觉得有点不好

original: K:It's alright, just wanted to remind you to be more cautious. I have a feeling something is off.
zh_trans: Kiki:我:没事,只是想提醒你小心点,我有种不对劲的感觉

original: Kiki:I will, K.
zh_trans: Kiki:我会的,K

original: Kiki:This facility is truly remarkable, having such mysterious underground passages.
zh_trans: Kiki:这个设施真的很了不起,有这么神秘的地下通道

original: ?????:Karllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll
Kiki:What was that terrifying sound?
zh_trans: Kiki:刚刚的声音好恐怖

original: K:This is what I meant by something being off. Be cautious, we've been discovered.
zh_trans: Kiki:我:这就是我说的有什么不对劲的意思,小心点,我们被发现了

original: story6 unlock
zh_trans: 故事6解锁

original: Kiki:It seems that the assistant ended up being here in the end...
zh_trans: Kiki:看来那个助理最后还是来了

original: story7 unlock
zh_trans: 故事7解锁

original: Kiki:Karl... Who is he? I feel like I know him somehow.
zh_trans: Kiki:Karl...是谁?,我好像知道他

original: Kiki:I remember now, that sound is from the head of this research institute, Brand.
zh_trans: Kiki:我想起来了,那个声音来自这个研究所的负责人Brand

original: Kiki:How did he end up like this?
zh_trans: Kiki:他怎么会变成这样的?

original: Brand:Karl, look at me. This is the teleportation project you vehemently denied at first.
zh_trans: Brand:Kral,看着我,这就是你一开始强烈否认的瞬间移动计划

original: Brand:I've successfully activated the teleportation portal.
zh_trans: Brand:我已经成功启动了传送门

original: Brand:Despite having both my legs torn off by the creature inside and losing one hand to its bite.
zh_trans: Brand:尽管我被里面的怪物咬去了我的双腿就与一只手

original: Brand:Luckily, I had a backup plan. I uploaded my consciousness to the network here.
zh_trans: Brand:但是幸好,我有一个备用计划,我把我的意识上传到了这里的网络

original: Brand:I can still manipulate everything here as a consciousness entity.
zh_trans: Brand:作为一个意识体,我仍然可以操纵这里的一切

original: Brand:Now, I will make you experience my power.
zh_trans: Brand:现在,我要让你感受我的力量!!!

original: Kiki:K!watch out
zh_trans: Kiki:K!小心

original: KIki:He escaped to the upper levels. Let's chase him. We must extract from him what has happened here.
zh_trans: Kiki:他逃到了上层,我们去追他吧,我们必须从他那里打听出这里发生的事情

original: Kiki:He's trying to escape on an airship. Let's catch up quickly!
zh_trans: Kiki:他正试图乘飞艇逃跑,让我们快点跟上进度

original: story9 unlock
zh_trans: 故事9解锁

original: Kiki:It seems that he knows how to salvage this situation.
zh_trans: Kiki:他似乎知道如何挽救这个局面

original: Hint:There should be no more than two people on the wheel.
zh_trans: [提示]轮子上的人数不可以超过两人

original: Kiki:here seems to be something on the right-side wheel. Hurry and go check it out.
zh_trans: Kiki:右侧的轮子上似乎有东西,快点去查看一下

original: Brand:No!!!!!!!!! You can't destroy my research.
zh_trans: Brand:不!!! 你不能毁掉我的研究成果

original: Kiki:Brand escaped.
zh_trans: Brand他逃走了

original: Kiki:Now we go to destroy the portal.
zh_trans: Kiki:现在我们去摧毁传送门

original: Kiki:We just need to toss this mini-bomb into the portal.
zh_trans: Kiki:我们只需要把这个迷你炸弹扔进传送门

original: Kiki:The creatures from the other realm have caught up as well.
zh_trans: Kiki:另一个世界的生物也来了

original: Kiki:Quick, get out of the way! The portal is releasing shockwaves. It doesn't want to be destroyed.
zh_trans: Kiki:快,让开!传送门正在释放冲击波

original: Kiki:Wait, hold on. Brand has caught up again.
zh_trans: Kiki:等等,等等,Brand又赶上来了

original: Brand:STOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP
zh_trans: Brand:快停下来!!!!

original: Kiki:K!WATCH OUT!
zh_trans: Kiki:K! 小心

original: K:Kiki..No...
zh_trans: K: Kiki..不...

original: K:We're home, Kiki.
zh_trans: K:我们到家了,Kiki

original: K:so
zh_trans: K:所以

original: K:Wake up
zh_trans: K:醒来吧

original: bad ending:Kiki couldn't dodge Brand's attack while trying to save you.
zh_trans: 坏结局:KiKi在救你的时候没能躲避Brand的攻击

original: All story Unlock
zh_trans: 所有故事都解锁了

original: You have found all the stories.
zh_trans: 你找到了所有故事

original: Sponsor:千音星璃
zh_trans: 感谢赞助者:千音星璃

original: 60 Seconds
story8 unlock
zh_trans: 故事8解锁

original: Kiki:It appears that Brand was ultimately eager to make achievements
zh_trans: Kiki:看来Brand还是渴望取得成功的

original: Kiki:K,The medical kit is on the left side's wheel.
zh_trans: Kiki:医疗包在左边的轮子上

original: Kiki:Karl, we did it.
zh_trans: Kiki:Karl,我们成功了

original: Kiki:Now we set off to destroy the portal.
zh_trans: Kiki:现在我们出发去摧毁传送门

original: Brand:Karl....I wrongly blamed you.
zh_trans: Brand:Karl...我错怪了你

original: Brand:Go ahead and destroy the portal. I will assist you.
zh_trans: Brand:去摧毁传送门吧,我会为你提供帮助

original: Kiki:Great, we've destroyed the portal.
zh_trans: Kiki:太好了,我们摧毁了传送门

original: Kiki:But there's bad news. The spaceship can't withstand the explosion and is going to crash.
zh_trans: Kiki:但是有个坏消息,宇宙飞船经不起爆炸,快要坠毁了

original: Karl:Hold on to me, Kiki!
zh_trans: Karl:抓住我,KiKi

original: Kiki:Karl... No, it should be 'Dad, welcome back.'
zh_trans: Kiki:Karl...不,应该是 父亲,欢迎回家

original: Kiki:我骇入飞船了，我只能控制飞船60秒，我们得趁现在赶上飞船
zh_trans: Kiki:我骇入飞船了，我只能控制飞船60秒，我们得趁现在赶上飞船

original: ***Voted to EX Mode***
zh_trans: ***已投票到EX模式***

original: ***Voted to Normal Mode***
zh_trans: ***已投票至普通模式***

original: EX Mode Clear
zh_trans: EX模式通关

original: Admin change to EX Mode
zh_trans: 管理员修改至EX模式

original: ****EX Mode****
